content: this beginner friendly crochet shawl pattern uses a basic combination of easy crochet stitches to create this stunning lacy texture it is worked from bottom up starting at the sharp point of the triangle working in short row towards the wider edge the finished shawl measures 78 cm at the widest point and 135 cm long it uses one gradient yarn cake in colour way painswick which is a four ply 500 meter yarn cake the finished size of the shawl is slightly smaller which is the perfect size for the warmer spring summer season or to wear under your coat the free crochet shawl pattern is also available on my blog
